title: Emerald Ad Jhumka - Bridal Edition
materials: 22K Gold Plated. Set with high-quality American Diamonds (AD) and a central
pear-shaped Emerald-Green CZ. The earring features a pearl drop. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Classic Jhumka silhouette with intricate filigree work. The design showcases a floral motif at the ear stud, leading to a layered Jhumka. Features delicate pearl dangles at the bottom.
colors: accented by the vibrant green of the Emerald-Green CZ.
occasions: and special occasions. Perfect for a half-saree function or a traditional Telugu ceremony.
description: These Jhumkas blend traditional design with modern craftsmanship. The brilliant sparkle of the American Diamonds complements the rich gold plating. It also creates a statement piece. Lightweight for comfortable wear, perfect for extended celebrations.
